modShortDescription: Adds the HD Chainsaw, HD Auger and a full set of scrap iron tools to the game.
modDescription:
Adds the HD Chainsaw, HD Auger and a full set of scrap iron [tools](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) to the game.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Update recipes.xml
* Stable Alpha 19.0 Update
